content: “Creeping into Power” analyses historical interpretations of the New Right Posted on 10. June 2020 15. June 2022 The book is edited by Policy Fellow Andreas Audretsch and historian Claudia Gatzka Dr. Andreas Audretsch , Dr. Claudia C. Gatzka , Prof. Dr. Hedwig Richter , Paul Jürgensen , Prof. Dr. Jürgen Kocka Book „Schleichend an die Macht“ Posted on 30. July 2020 15. June 2022 Reaktionen auf das Buch unserer Fellows Andreas Audretsch und Claudia Gatzka Dr. Andreas Audretsch , Dr. Claudia C. Gatzka , Prof. Dr. Hedwig Richter , Prof. Dr. Jürgen Kocka , Paul Jürgensen , Tereza Novotná In the Media From Berlin to Brussels – Stay up to date on the progressive politics that matter. Our newsletter gives you all the necessary information about our latest events, studies and debates. subscribe We develop and debate progressive ideas and bring together leading actors who turn thoughts into action. Our think tank’s goal: making the just transformation a reality. ▸ Learn more

metadata.title: Prof. Dr. Jürgen Kocka - Das Progressive Zentrum - EN
metadata.snippet: Jul 30, 2020 ... Jürgen Kocka studied history, political science, German philology, sociology and philosophy in inter alia Marburg, Wien, Berlin and Chapel Hill.
